name: de|growth: floating in precision
description:
a collaboration between Jacek Markusiewicz and Luis Fraguada.

two structures confronting precision.

driven by a custom growth/shrinking algorithm and an algorithm that exploits floating point arithmetic precision errors.

the animation is generated using a renderer written in C#.

1024x1024px, 495 frames, gif

@jMarkusiewicz
@luisfraguada
